title: Russia moves to block WhatsApp in messaging app crackdown
summary_full: WhatsApp says the move aims to push its 90 million users in Russia to a "state-owned surveillance app".
summary_public: WhatsApp says the move aims to push its 90 million users in Russia to a "state-owned surveillance app".

RU.label: negative
RU.evidence: Russia moves to block WhatsApp in messaging app crackdown
